item.name: mace egyptian
item.description: A hierogylph-engraved mace has been left here.

extra_description.description: The mace is formed from solid brass, and engraved in strange hieroglyphs.

item.name: robe sand
item.description: Sand-colored robes lie here.

extra_description.description: The robes are colored a sandy off-white, and are in fact caked and covered with sand as well. You don't seem to be able to remove all of the sand, no matter how much you try.

item.name: dirk obsidian
item.description: A flat dirk made of chipped obsidian lies here.

extra_description.description: The blade of the dirk is black, glassy obsidian, chipped razor sharp.

item.name: turban cloth
item.description: A dirty cloth turban has been forgotten here.

extra_description.description: The turban used to be white cloth, now it is covered with oil and dirt from the head and hair of its previous owner, who must not have bathed much.

item.name: wrappings cloth
item.description: Long cloth wrappings lie on the ground in a pile.

extra_description.description: The cloth wrappings are old, wrinkled, and stink of embalming fluid.

item.name: bottle fluid
item.description: A dusty bottle lies here on the ground.

extra_description.description: The bottle is dusty and the fluid has a strange sickly-sweet smell to it.

item.name: jar formaldehyde
item.description: A small jar lies here on the ground.

extra_description.description: The jar is sticky and smells really bad.

item.name: ball fire
item.short_description: a small hot ball of fire
item.description: A little ball of fire hovers in the air before your eyes.

extra_description.description: The ball of fire is hot to the touch and very very bright.

item.name: scimitar stone
item.description: A curved scimitar made of stone rests on the ground.

extra_description.description: The scimitar is formed from solid stone, chipped and carved to perfection, with a sharp, cold blade that is marred only by a few nicks here and there.

item.name: key stone
item.description: A stone key has been dropped here.

extra_description.description: The key is made from stone, but is otherwise unremarkable.

item.name: sarcophagus stone
item.description: A mighty stone sarcophagus lies in the center of the tomb.

extra_description.description:
The sarcophagus is engraved on the sides with the images of pharoahs, great wars fought long ago, mighty pyramids being constructed...
A raised image atop the sarcophagus is formed in the visage of one of the mighty pharoahs, painted in gold and studded with precious gems.
You see a small keyhole in the side of the sarcophagus.

item.name: dust
item.description: A small pile of dust is being scattered by the breeze.

extra_description.description: The dust is old. As you sift it through your hands you find tiny chips of aged bone inside -- it must be the ancient remains of something.

item.name: scarab emerald
item.description: A small emerald scarab lies here on the ground.

extra_description.description: The scarab is intricately detailed, down to the tiny hairs on its insectile legs and the faceting of the emeralds in its eyes.

item.name: lamp
item.description: A small, tarnished, battered lamp has been dropped here.

extra_description.description: The lamp is quite old and tarnished. You rub at it to get some of the grime off, but it doesn't seem like anybody is home.

item.name: ankh
item.description: A small brass ankh has been left here.

extra_description.description: The ankh is a small brass symbol of an ancient religion. It glows with a soft bright light that is soothing to you.

item.name: book riddles
item.description: A medium-sized parchment book with well-worn pages lies here.

extra_description.description: The book has well-worn pages, containing many befuddling riddles to surprise, confuse, and amuse you. You find yourself bewildered by its contents and put it down to sort your head out.

item.name: paw lion
item.description: The mighty paw of a lion-like creature has been dropped here.

extra_description.description: The massive paw has straps on it formed of bronze, so that it will fit snugly over your hand. As you put it on, it melds with your hand, becoming an extension of your arm.

item.name: parchment answer
item.description: A small piece of parchment covered in hieroglyphics lies here.

extra_description.description: You cannot decipher the strange hieroglyphics that cover the sheet of parchment.

item.name: treasure
item.description: The massive treasure of the sphinx lies here in a big pile.

extra_description.description: The treasure is incredibly large, filled with gold coins and valuables, more wealth than you could ever possibly imagine accumulated in one place.

item.name: sand pile
item.description: You see a small pile of sand.

extra_description.description: You think you see some coins and valuables glinting amongst the grains of sand.

item.name: curse mummy
item.description: Some fortunate soul has escaped the mummy's curse, for now.

extra_description.description: Rumor has it that whomever disturbs the grave of the mummy shall be cursed for all eternity, and that the descendents of that person shall likewise be cursed for ten generations to follow.

item.name: elixir small glass
item.description: A small glass elixir lies under your feet.

extra_description.description: The elixir is deceptively small. Something tells you that its contents are truly quite potent. Perhaps too potent for ordinary mortals to attempt to consume.

item.name: mask golden
item.description: A beautiful, intricately detailed mask has been forgotten here.

extra_description.description: This beautiful mask was shaped from solid gold and magically enchanted to perfectly fit the face of any who choose to wear it, its golden features and turquoise highlights even moving to match the expressions of the face of the wearer.

Aha!
You see a multifaceted gemstone, which strangely reflects no light, making it very hard to see when it lies on the ground.

item.name: wand sun brass pipe
item.description: A small length of brass pipe shines here with its own light.

extra_description.description: This small brass shaft is a holy weapon used by the ancient people of this land to defend against the deadliest of foes. It shines with the brilliant blazing light of the sun.

item.name: ring sandy
item.description: A small sandy-coloured ring has been carelessly dropped here.

extra_description.description: The ring is small, smooth, sandy-coloured and unremarkable, save that it gives off a continuous low humming noise that tickles your fingertips.

item.name: sphinx golden
item.description: A small golden sphinx glints in the light.

extra_description.description: The golden sphinx is incredibly detailed and very small, fitting easily into the palm of your hand. You can even make out the expression of wisdom and peace on its face.

item.name: leggings sphinxian
item.description: Massive leggings formed from the body of a sphinx stand here.

extra_description.description: These magically fashioned leggings impart the strength and stamina of the mightiest of the ancient sphinxes. You feel ancient power emanating from them; they seem to be almost alive.
